resources.string: To splitr your bill you will need to photograph your bill using the capture image button below. Next tap items on the bill to select what belong to you. Your total will automatically be updated in the Total box below. Tap Capture Image to open the camera.
Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
